title: Read this before posting
content:
This forum has been added to fix the fact that the Unofficial Keen Games forum is loaded up with so many junk topics that it's hard to find anything that actually has a game release or something similar.

Here you can post your Keen creations--this includes fan games, modifications, a website, or something else that you put a substantial amount of time into, such as a flash animation. This forum will be heavily moderated, and topics that do not follow the guidelines will be moved or deleted without warning.

This forum is not a place to post screenshots or ideas. Keep those in the Unofficial Keen Games forum. If you want to post a demo of a game, make sure a large amount of time has been put into it. Stuff thrown together in two minutes will be removed from this forum.Yay and God said to Abraham, "you will kill your son, Issak", and Abraham said, "I can't hear you, you'll have to speak into the microphone." "Oh I'm sorry, Is this better? Check, check, check... Jerry, pull the high end out, I'm still getting some hiss back here." -- Stewie
[url=http://spatang.com] spatang.com[/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]
